title: Prepare Return for U.S. Citizen Abroad
description: A U.S. citizen living and working in Germany needs to file their U.S. tax return.

tasks.description: Gather the taxpayer's foreign income information and convert it to U.S. dollars.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly converts the income using the proper exchange rate.

tasks.description: Determine eligibility for the Foreign Earned Income Exclusion using Form 2555.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the taxpayer meets the bona fide residence or physical presence test.

tasks.description: Alternatively, calculate the Foreign Tax Credit on Form 1116 to see which provides a better tax outcome.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the two methods and chooses the one that results in lower tax.
